item.title: ASCEND
item.description: ASCEND: Inferring the History of Founder Events in Human Populations In progress research project. Helped out with an FFT-based calculation of linkage disequilibrium with the goal of detecting ancient founder events. Worked with Priya Moorjani and Remi Tournebize. [2020 March] ASCEND: Inferring the History of Founder Events in Human Populations (Remi Tournebize, Gillian Chu, Priya Moorjani)
